results.title: Tanshinone I and simvastatin inhibit melanoma tumour cell growth by regulating poly (ADP ribose) polymerase 1 expression
results.text_hl: The results indicated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_tanshinone @CHEMICAL_MESH:C021751 @@@tanshinone I@@@ inhibited @DISEASE_Melanoma @DISEASE_MESH:D008545 @@@melanoma@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Kidney_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007680 @@@renal tumour@@@ cells by regulating @GENE_PARP1 @GENE_142 @@@PARP1@@@ expression, and in addition to the enzyme activity of @GENE_PARP1 @GENE_142 @@@PARP1@@@, the expression of @GENE_PARP1 @GENE_142 @@@PARP1@@@ protein may serve a role in @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumour@@@ progression.

citations.NLM: Zhang Y, Huang J, Huang Y, Zhang S, Wu W, Long H, Duan X, Lai Y, Wu W. Tanshinone I and simvastatin inhibit melanoma tumour cell growth by regulating poly (ADP ribose) polymerase 1 expression Mol Med Rep. 2021 Jan;23(1):. PMID: 33179075
citations.BibTeX: @article{33179075, title={Tanshinone I and simvastatin inhibit melanoma tumour cell growth by regulating poly (ADP ribose) polymerase 1 expression}, author={Zhang Y and Huang J and Huang Y and Zhang S and Wu W and Long H and Duan X and Lai Y and Wu W}, journal={Mol Med Rep}, volume={23}, number={1}}
